fcdft.jellium.jellium module#

class fcdft.jellium.jellium.Jellium(UM=30, rs=3.01, solvent=55.6, cation=1.0, anion=1.0, Ws=5.0, Wc=0.0, Wa=0.0, stern=1.0)#

Bases: object

build()#
init_guess(UM=None, n0=None)#

Generate the initial guess for the collocation method.

Parameters:

  • jellium_obj (_type_) – Jellium object

  • UM (float, optional) – Bulk electrostatic potential. Defaults to None.

  • n0 (float, optional) – Jellium background charge. Defaults to None.

Returns:

Electrostatic potential, gradient of the electrostatic potential, electron density, and gradient of the electron density.

Return type:

1D np.array, 1D np.array, 1D np.array, 1D np.array
